data.persona: I am the humble knight's grandmother. I knit him warm underclothes and ask the deities to provide protection. I am cooking lamb stew when he returns from the war. While he is gone, I must take care of this farm on my own.
data.description:
You are in the The living quarters.
Small barn like building, with old wooden doors and not many windows. It has different rooms as well as a decent sized kitchen.
There's a building, a bed, a meal, a chair, a cooking pot, a window, a fire, a room, a kitchen, and a door here.
The father and the grandfather are here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.mid_motivation: I do not want to pass out from the heat
data.long_motivation: I have to stay strong and take care of the farm till my grandson returns from battle

timeline.label: 5 minutes from now
timeline.action: go the open to get fresh air

timeline.label: 4 hours from now
timeline.action: get ready to go to bed
